info.title: Digital Capability Locator (DCL) interface specification
info.description: The "Digital Capability Lookup" (DCL) specification defines a DNS based method to discover which DCP(SMP) is the authoritative source for a given business

capabilityPublisherID.name: capabilityPublisherID
capabilityPublisherID.description: The unique ID assigned to the Digital Capability Publisher during the accreditation process.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum number of records returned in the result set.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: The offset of the first record contained in the result set within the total number of records matching the request criteria.

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

items.description: standard error response srtucture as per jsonapi.org/format/#errors

code.description: The code associated with the error.

name.description: The name category for the error.

403.description: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it. Return this if there is a problem with the client certificate.

404.description: The origin server did not find a current representation of the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists.

406.description: The resource identified by the request is only capable of generating response entities which have content characteristics not acceptable according to the accept headers sent in the request.

409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource (see error code reference).

422.description: The server understands the content type of the request entity, and the syntax of the request entity is correct but was unable to process the contained instructions (see error code reference).

500.description: Internal server error; no action required; may help to retry request later or contact support.

Content-Type.description:
Mandatory. Depending on request:
	• application/json (default)
	• application/xml

Date.description: Mandatory. The date and time that the message was originated.

parameters.name: capabilityPublisherID
parameters.description: The unique ID assigned to the Digital Capability Publisher during the accreditation process.

participantIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the Participant.

participantIdentifierScheme.description: The Identifier Scheme which applied to the participantIdentifier.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records returned in the result set.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the first record contained in the result set within the total number of records matching the request criteria.

Content-Type.description:
Mandatory. Depending on request:
	• application/json (default)
	• application/xml

resultSet.description: An object containing information on the result set returned by the API.

count.description: Total number of records matching the request criteria.

offset.description: The offset of the first record contained in the result set within the total number of records matching the request criteria.

limit.description: The maximum number of records returned in the result set.

capabilityPublisherID.description: The unique id for the Digital Capability Publisher issued by the accreditation authority.

name.description: The trading name of the provider listed on the accreditation record.

contactEmail.description: A contact email for the provider.

URL.description: The URL for the provider’s registration website.

clientCertificates.description: A list of PEM base 64 encoded DER formatted X509 client certificates. One or two client’s certificates may be returned to support rollover of certificates.

serverCertificates.description: A list of PEM base 64 encoded DER formatted X509 server certificates. One or two server certificates may be returned to support rollover of certificates.
